Taiwan Bloggers

Jul 4, 2005

The most rewarding aspect of blogging for me has been all the other bloggers I’ve gotten to know. Unfortunately, it is only rarely I get to meet them face-to-face, like I did at the South Asian Bloggers Meetup. So it was really great to meet a cool bunch of Taiwanese bloggers last night. I owe a big debt to Zonble for letting everyone know about the event. I’m really inspired to spend more time in the Chinese-languag blogsphere!

Scott has the list of bloggers in attendance. There were also some non-blogging friends who showed up. I’ve posted my pictures on flickr. Hopefully others will post more with the tag 毒茶, since I didn’t take too many.

UPDATE: Alice’s photos from the party.

{bloggers, Taiwan, Taiwanbloggers, 毒茶}
